A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While it's always nice to have a new Star Wars film\, The Last Jedi was exactly what I expected and thus disappointing. Suspense was built with overly-obvious slapstick humor instead of depth\, subtlety\, or fear for the characters. The movie generally lacked direction\, as characters were sent off on side-quests that were obviously there to fill time. In general\, I feel like The Last Jedi ends up somewhere closer to the prequels in the quality of it's story line and characters than the original films.
